description:
How will the gang adjust to the newest girlfriend, and what shenanigans will she bring into play during this sleepover?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят (осталось 94)
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo (Ato 94-nin)
The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You (94 to Go)
君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女 (あと94人)
